mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_medical_appointment
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT t_medical_appointment.id,t_medical_appointment.consumer_id AS c_id,t_medical_appointment.time, t_medical_appointment.general_inspection,t_medical_appointment.medical_examination, t_medical_appointment.surgical_examination,t_medical_appointment.ecg_examination, t_medical_appointment.x_ray_examination,t_medical_appointment.blood_routine_examination, t_medical_appointment.urine_routine_examination,t_medical_appointment.hepatic_examination, t_medical_appointment.gmt_create,t_consumer.name AS c_name,t_consumer.img AS c_img, t_medical_appointment.status FROM t_medical_appointment,t_consumer WHERE t_consumer.id = t_medical_appointment.consumer_id AND t_consumer.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into t_medical_appointment (id, consumer_id, doctor_id, time, general_inspection, medical_examination, surgical_examination, ecg_examination, x_ray_examination, blood_routine_examination, urine_routine_examination, hepatic_examination, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{consumerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{generalInspection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalExamination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surgicalExamination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ecgExamination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xRayExamination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bloodRoutineExamination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urineRoutineExamination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hepaticExamination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
